channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole on the north carriage way (heading towards Birdlip), 8th April
item.description:
Deep pothole close to The Landers sign.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Clovelly Ermin Way
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole near junction, 8th April
item.description:
Pothole is on the bend and people are swerving into the other carriage way. The hole is between the Great Witcombe turning and the pavement starting on the south side carriage way (heading towards Brockworth). Rough What 3 Words reference; https://w3w.co/printing.budgeted.history
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Clovelly Ermin Way
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown Hedge, 8th April
item.description:
Forced left. fell in road when caught walking stick on curb. Hedge takes up more than half of pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Mary Rose Avenue, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Horsefair street between church and Croft Drive, 8th April
item.description:
Numerous potholes and large areas of road degradation. This was reported as repaired, but lots of damaged road still needs repairing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Horsefair Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Overhanging branch, 8th April
item.description:

item.title: Long Potholes, 8th April
item.description:
These are multiple long potholes where old foxes have broke up on the side of the road down the hill. Tbh if a gang is going out they might as well assess the whole hill as there are quite a few dotted along the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Salterley Grange Salterley Grange, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 7th April
item.description:
Before the hedges get greened up, would be great if this area could have litter picked up and also take away all the various pieces of debris and left over signs etc removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Gilpin Avenue, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A40 Lansdown Road - abandoned roadworks sign, 7th April
item.description:
GL51 6QR - Abandoned (broken) triangular black plastic roadworks sign - lying on pavement at end of railway bridge in Lansdown Road (A40), opposite junction with Shelburne Road, by escooter station / adjacent to concrete wall to railway bridge. Sign been there for several weeks - needs removing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Lansdown Castle Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 7th April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 39 Malden Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Large potholes, 7th April
item.description:
These potholes just keep growing, all the way up Prestbury Road to Cromwell Road, meaning drivers either need to sacrifice their cars into the potholes or drive down the middle of the road to straddle and avoid them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 44 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large numerous potholes, 7th April
item.description:
Potholes have been there for at least 6 months and getting worse especially when bin lorries use the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 138 Golden Vale, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
